alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pomona Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, San Mateo, Satsuma and Lake Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
